name: technologically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 in a way that relates to or involves technology: She likes to stay up to date technologically. They are the most technologically advanced nation in the world. See
technological
More examplesFewer examplesShe is determined to make the job technologically easier.We live in such a technologically driven culture.There's no way the Red Cross could have been technologically ready for this type of disaster.

in a way that relates to modern technology and how it is used: Customers do not just buy products that are technologically superior. We aim to achieve the maximum improvements in energy efficiency that are technologically feasible. technologically advanced/complex/sophisticated
